metadata.title: CVE-2018-14668 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In ClickHouse before 1.1.54388, "remote" table function allowed arbitrarysymbols in "user", "password" and "default_database" fields which led toCross Protocol Request Forgery Attacks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14668` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

clickhouse-client - 18.16.1+ds-7
clickhouse-common - 18.16.1+ds-7
clickhouse-server - 18.16.1+ds-7
clickhouse-tools - 18.16.1+ds-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: clickhouse package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.16.1+ds-7').
